codeInspectr 0.0.0.9000

  • Changelog

Return summary of open Github Issues

Source: R/github_reporter.R
get_issues.Rd

Return summary of open Github Issues

Usage

get_issues(repo_address, max_char = 97)

Arguments

repo_address

Github repository address, of the form "user/repository", as in "FRAMverse/framrsquared". Does not need to be an R package.

max_char

Maximum number of characters to return in the "body" column.

Value

dataframe with $title, $body, and $date of open issues.

Examples

get_issues("FRAMverse/framrsquared")
#>                                                                                            title
